title: Exemption from arrest and service
context: ยง121-25 Exemption from arrest and service. No member of the army or air national guard or of the militia of the State shall be arrested or subjected to service under any civil process while going to, remaining at, or returning from any place of military duty in pursuance of an order of the President of the United States or the governor. [L 1967, c 196, pt of ยง1; HRS ยง121-25]
